int targa_applyRgbaMask ( Targa *  targa,
int  colorType,
unsigned char  value 
)

targa_applyRgbaMask()

Apply a red, green, blue or alpha-channel additive color-mask to a loaded Targa image.

Parameters:
targa(in) The Targa struct of a loaded image.
colorType(in) The color channel to mask.
value(in) The color code (0 - 255) to mask.
Returns:
An integer where zero is pass, less than zero is failure.

int targa_loadFromData ( Targa *  targa,
unsigned char *  data,
int  dataLength 
)

targa_loadFromData()

Load the targa from an in-memory location and decode it into a 32-bit RGBA serialize image.

Parameters:
targa(in) The Targa struct an image to load.
data(in) A pointer to an in-memory location containing a Targa image.
dataLength(in) The length of the Targa in-memory image.
Returns:
An integer where zero is pass, less than zero is failure.

)

targa_loadFromFile()

Load a targa file and decode it into a 32-bit RGBA serialized image.

Parameters:

filename(in) The filename of the image to load.
Returns:
An integer where zero is pass, less than zero is failure.

int  colorType,
unsigned char  value 
)

targa_setRgbaChannel()

Apply a red, green, blue or alpha-channel additive color-channel replacement to a loaded Targa image.

Parameters:
targa(in) The Targa struct of a loaded image.
colorType(in) The color channel to replace.
value(in) The color code (0 - 255) to replace.
Returns:
An integer where zero is pass, less than zero is failure.
